answerText: Mrs. Clarissa Dalloway [accept either underlined][10] This author's last novel, Between the Acts, is about a pageant at Bartholomew Oliver's house. She also wrote Mrs Dalloway.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 7 | 2 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character despises the history teacher, Miss Doris Kilman, as they compete for influence over Elizabeth. [10] Name this character who once rejected Peter Walsh's hand in marriage. Her story is paralleled by the story of Septimus, who commits suicide to avoid a doctor.
